data.title: Christina Aguilera: the life and facts
data.meta_description: Everything you have always wanted to know about the life and career of the pop star.
data.text:
Christina Aguilera: everything you need to know - Christina Aguilera, or X-Tina, has one of the most powerful voices in the music industry. She started singing when she was young and her family has always supported her. The singer has recorded duets with many renowned artists, changed her look countless times, and has been at the center of some controversies. But her talent is undeniable! Click through this gallery to find out all about the life of Christina Aguilera.

© Getty Images

Profile - Christina María Aguilera was born on 18 December 1980 in New York. She's the daughter of Fausto Wagner Xavier Aguilera, an Ecuadorian-born Sergeant in the US Army, and Shelly Loraine Fidler, a Spanish translator and violin player of Irish background.

© Getty Images

Britney Spears - There were rumors Christina and Britney didn't get along, but the two shared a stage during the Video Music Awards to sing Madonna's 'Like a Virgin.'

© Getty Images

Baby boy - A few weeks after her baby was born, she sold his picture to People magazine for $1.5 million. According to Forbes magazine, the photo was the fifth most expensive picture of a celebrity's child.

© Getty Images

Acting career - The singer was invited to play the role of Stephanie Necrophuros in the movie 'Nine,' but because of her busy touring schedule she had to refuse it. The role eventually went to Kate Hudson.

© Getty Images

Piercings - In an interview, X-Tina said she removed all the piercings she had, except for the one through her right nipple.

© Getty Images

New romance - A few weeks after she confirmed that she and Jordan Bratman had separated, she started dating Matthew Rutler, who she met on the set of 'Burlesque.'

© Getty Images

© Getty Images

'Bionic' - Only three months after the birth of her first child, she went back to the studio to record her fourth álbum, 'Bionic.'

© Getty Images

Acting career - The singer was invited to play the role of Stephanie Necrophuros in the movie 'Nine,' but because of her busy touring schedule she had to refuse it. The role eventually went to Kate Hudson.

© Getty Images

© Getty Images

New romance - A few weeks after she confirmed that she and Jordan Bratman had separated, she started dating Matthew Rutler, who she met on the set of 'Burlesque.'

© Getty Images

'The Voice' - On TV singing contest 'The Voice,' she was known for being the 'mommy' of the team.

© Getty Images

Conquer - One of the singer's greatest achievements is having a number 1 single in the Billboard Hot 100 charts in three consecutive decades!

© Getty Images

As the singer turns 37, we take a look at the highlights of her career and personal life. The singer has recorded duets with many renowned artists, changed her look multiple times, and has been at the center of some controversies. But her talent is undeniable!

Click through this gallery to find out all about the pop star with the huge voice.
